data.text: Pen Jisas bɨne okok kɨlop agak, Gos awl ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. God nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, yɨp abe gos lɨnɨŋɨd gɨnɨmɨb agak.
14.2 Jon 13.33, 13.36 Bapi kal ne ak, tep kuŋay yɨbɨl mɨdeb agak. Yad amɨl, tep nɨbop wakay ogɨnap gɨlɨtep gɨnɨgayn agak. Pen tep anɨb okok ma yobɨkop ak, nɨbop ma apɨnep agak.
14.3 Jon 12.26, 17.24, Apo 1.11, 1 Te 4.17 Pen yad amɨl tep nɨbop ak gɨlɨtep gɨl nɨm, apɨl nɨbop dɨl poŋɨd amnɨgayn agak. Anɨgen, man yad mɨdebin anɨb ak, nɨbi abe ayɨp yenɨmɨb agak.
Man akal amnɨgebin kanɨb anɨb ak, nɨbi nepɨm agak.
Jisas anɨb agek, Tomas agak, Bɨawl, akal ameban chɨn ma nopun agak. Anɨb ak taydɨl kanɨb amnɨgaban anɨb ak nɨŋɨd amnɨgabun agak?

14.6 Jon 1.4, 1.17, 8.19, 8.32, 10.9, 11.25, Lom 5.1-2, Hib 9.8, 10.20 Agek Jisas agak, Yad nokom nɨm kanɨbtam ak, yad nokom nɨm takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak, yad nokom nɨm gen binɨb pel mɨdtep gebal agak. Bɨ olap kanɨb anɨb ak ke amɨl, Bapi yɨl ak amnɨmuŋ tek ma lup agak. Mel yɨbɨl agak. Yad nokom nɨm kanɨbtam Bapi yɨl ameb ak agak.
14.7 Jon 8.19 Yɨp nɨgtep gɨl nɨm, Bapi nop abe nɨgtep gɨnɨgabɨm agak. Pen mɨñɨl ñɨn awl nɨg dad amɨl nop wɨdɨn nepɨm agak.
Anɨb agek, Pilip agak, Bɨawl, Nap nop chɨnop yomnɨmɨn ak, tep agak.

14.9 Jon 12.45, Kol 1.15, Hib 1.3 Agek Jisas agak, Pilip, nɨb ayɨp pel yesɨpin ak pen, yɨp ma nepan akaŋ agak? Bɨ olap yɨp wɨdɨn nɨgup ak, Nap nop wɨdɨn nɨgup agak. Anɨb ak taydɨl ageban, Nap nop chɨnop yome nɨgɨnɨgun ageban agak?

14.10 Jon 7.16, 8.28, 10.38, 12.49, 14.24, 17.21-23 Yad Bapi ayɨp mɨdebin, ne yad ayɨp mɨdeb agak. Gos anɨb ak ma nepan akaŋ agak? Takaw nɨbop apin okok, yad ke nɨŋɨd ma apin agak. Bapi pen yad ayɨp mɨdeb ak, wog ne ke geb agak.

14.11 Jon 5.36, 10.38, 14.20 Yad Bapi ayɨp mɨdebin, ne yad ayɨp mɨdeb takaw ak, nɨŋɨd agɨl nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Pen gos anɨb ak nɨgep tek ma lonɨmuŋ, wog tɨtay gɨpin okok nɨŋɨd, anɨgup agɨl gos ak nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak.

14.12 Mat 21.21, Mak 16.16-20, Luk 10.17 Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin, bɨ yɨp gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgab ak, yad wog okok gɨpin tek gɨnɨgab agak. Pen Bapi yɨl amnɨgebin anɨb ak tek, bɨ anɨb ak wog awl yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak.
14.13 Mat 7.7, Luk 11.9, Jon 15.7, 15.16, Jem 1.5, 1 Jo 3.22 Yad Ñɨne mɨdebin ak, Bapi yɨb awl dɨnɨmuŋ agɨl gos nepin agak. Anɨb ak tek, yɨb yɨp ak dɨl agnɨgem, agɨnɨgabɨm tek gɨnɨgayn agak.
Yɨb yɨp ak dɨl tap tay gos nɨŋɨd agnɨgem, agɨnɨgabɨm tek gɨnɨgayn agak.
Pen Jisas anɨb agak, Yɨp mapen lɨl nɨm, takaw yad ak nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨnɨgabɨm agak.
14.16 Jon 14.26, 15.26, 16.7, Lom 8.15, 8.26 Yad Bapi nop agnɨgen, ne nɨbop Bɨ Gɨtep Gep olap sek ñek ownɨgab agak. Apɨl, nɨb ayɨp pel pelnep yenɨgab agak.

14.17 Mat 10.20, Jon 16.13, Lom 8.26, 1 Ko 2.14, 1 Jo 2.27, 4.6 Bɨ Gɨtep Gep anɨb ak nɨm, God Kawnan ne ak takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agup ak nep agak. Binɨb lum awl okok, nop gos ma nepal, wɨdɨn abe ma nepal, anɨb ak nop dɨnɨgel tek ma lup agak. Pen ne nɨb ayɨp mɨdɨl, kɨdek pɨsnep bak lɨl yenɨgab anɨb ak, nop nepɨm agak.
Nɨbop pɨsnep kelɨg amen, nɨbi ñapay amon ñɨlɨk tek ma yenɨgabɨm agak. Nɨbop tepayaŋ ownɨgayn agak.

14.19 Jon 16.16, 1 Ko 15.20 Binɨb lum awl okok, yɨp mɨñɨl sɨkol won olap nɨgebal, kɨdek yɨp ma nɨgɨnɨgabal agak. Nɨbi pen yɨp nɨgɨnɨgabɨm agak. Yad bɨ kɨm mɨdep ak, kɨm yenɨgayn tek, nɨbi abe kɨm yenɨgabɨm agak.
14.20 Jon 10.38, 14.10, 17.21-26 Ñɨn anɨb ak, yad Bapi ayɨp mɨdebin ak gos nɨgtep gɨnɨgabɨm agak. Nɨbi yad ayɨp mɨdebɨm, yad nɨb ayɨp mɨdebin ak abe gos nɨgtep gɨnɨgabɨm agak.

14.21 Jon 14.15, 14.23, 15.10, 16.27, 1 Jo 2.5, 5.3 Bɨ takaw yad ak nɨŋɨd dɨl kɨdek gup ak, bɨ anɨb ak yɨp mapen lup agak. Pen yɨp mapen lup ak, Bapi bɨ anɨb anop mapen lɨnɨgab agak. Yad abe nop mapen lɨl, yad ke nop yomnɨgayn agak.
Anɨb agek, Judas Yiskaliyot mel, Judas olap ne Jisas nop agak, Bɨawl, taynen nad ke chɨnop yomnɨgaban ak pen, binɨb lum awl okok nad ke kɨlop ma yomnɨgaban agak?

14.23 Mat 18.20, Jon 14.15, 2 Ko 6.16, Epe 3.17, 1 Jo 2.24, Lep 3.20 Agek, Jisas pen nop agak, Bɨ yɨp mapen lonɨmuŋ, takaw yad ak nɨŋɨd dɨnɨgab agak. Anɨgɨl nɨŋɨd dek nɨm, Bapi bɨ anɨb anop mapen lɨl, chɨlapɨl abe apɨl ne ayɨp mɨdɨl, pel yonɨgabul agak.
14.24 Jon 5.19, 5.38, 7.16, 12.49 Bɨ yɨp mapen ma lup ak, takaw yad ak nɨŋɨd ma dup agak. Takaw nɨgebɨm anɨb ak, takaw yad mel agak. Bapi yɨp agyokek ownek ak, takaw ne ak nɨgebɨm agak.
Nɨb ayɨp mɨdebin ñɨn awl, takaw anɨb awl agñɨbin agak.

14.26 Luk 24.49, Jon 14.16, 15.26, 16.13, 1 Jo 2.20, 2.27 Bɨ Gɨtep Gep ak pen, God Kawnan ne ak mɨdeb agak. Bapi ne yɨb yɨp ak dɨl, nop agyokek ownɨgab agak. Ne apɨl nɨbop tap okok mɨdupsek agñɨl, nɨbop gek takaw apin mɨdupsek okok gos nɨgɨlɨg mɨdɨl, nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabɨm agak.

Yad amebin tek, nɨbop gen mɨdtep gɨnɨgabɨm agak. Yad mɨdtep gɨpin tek, nɨbop gen mɨdtep gɨnɨgabɨm agak. Pen nɨbop gen mɨdtep gɨnɨgabɨm anɨb ak, binɨb lum awl okok nɨbop gel mɨdtep gɨnɨgabɨm tek ma lup agak. Anɨb ak tek, gos awl ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb, ma pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb agak.

14.28 Luk 24.51, Jon 14.3, 14.12, 14.18, 16.28, 20.17, Plp 2.6 Yad amɨl adɨkɨd nɨbop ownɨgayn apin ak nepɨm agak. Bapi ne bɨawl yɨbɨl mɨdeb, kɨles ne ak tap awl yɨbɨl, kɨles yad ak sɨkol gup agak. Anɨb okok nɨŋɨd, yɨp mapen lɨpɨm tek, Nap yɨl ameb agɨl, mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg yebɨkep agak.
14.29 Jon 13.19, 16.4 Tap anɨb okok mɨñɨl ma gup ak pen, nɨbop ned anɨgɨl agebin agak. Ak nɨm kɨdek anɨgenɨgab ñɨn anɨb ak, nɨŋɨd yɨp gos lɨnɨgɨnɨmɨb agak.
14.30 Jon 12.31, 16.11, Epe 2.2 Bɨawl binɨb lum awl okok kɨlop kodup ak, yɨp kodup tek ma lup agak. Pen mɨñɨl apeb ak nɨm, takaw kuŋay ma agɨnɨgebin agak.
14.31 Mat 26.46, Jon 10.18, 12.49, Plp 2.8, Hib 5.8 Pen binɨb lum awl okok nɨgenɨgel, yad Bapi nop mapen lɨl, Bapi agup tek gɨtep gɨl gɨpin ak agak. Tep, apem amnun agak.
